it.polimi.se2019.server.model

Class Player

  • java.lang.Object
    • it.polimi.se2019.server.model.Player
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Targetable

    public class Player
extends Object
implements Targetable
    This class implements the player of the game. Each player is defined by its figure Figure. A player handles all the basic actions that are needed to play in a turn. It implements Targetable Targetable as a player can be targeted by a weapon.
